title: Shanks Used Future Vision to Arrive at the Perfect Moment
theory: Shanks possesses advanced Observation Haki that allows him to see into the future. This ability enabled him to arrive at Marineford at the exact moment when his intervention would have maximum impact - saving Koby, allowing Law to escape with Luffy, and ending the war. The precision of his timing suggests he saw this moment before it happened.
evidence: Shanks arrived at the exact second before Akainu killed Koby
His arrival created the perfect distraction for Law's submarine to escape
Shanks' statement that Koby's actions 'will change the world' suggests he saw Koby's future
Later revelations about Shanks' Observation Haki abilities support this theory
author: One Piece fan community

title: Koby Will Become a Future Admiral
theory: Shanks' declaration that Koby's courage 'will change the world' is a prophecy about Koby's future as a Marine Admiral. Shanks, possibly seeing the future, recognized that saving Koby would preserve someone who will become a key figure in reforming the Marines from within. Koby's Observation Haki awakening and moral courage at Marineford mark him as someone who will rise to the highest ranks while maintaining his sense of justice.
evidence: Shanks specifically intervened to save Koby despite the risk
Shanks made a prophecy about Koby changing the world
Doctor Fishbonen stated that all vice admirals and above have Haki
Koby's character arc parallels Luffy's - both chasing seemingly impossible dreams
Koby's exponential growth rate since Marineford
His awakening of Observation Haki marks him as having admiral-level potential

title: Koby's Plea Directly Saved Luffy's Life
theory: While Shanks is often credited with ending the war and saving Luffy, it was actually Koby's desperate scream that created the crucial pause in fighting. Kizaru, who was seconds away from destroying Law's submarine with a light beam, stopped to look at Koby during his speech. This moment's pause gave Law the time needed to submerge and escape. Without Koby's intervention, Kizaru would have killed Luffy before Shanks even arrived. Therefore, Koby is the true savior of Luffy's life at Marineford.
evidence: The episode shows Kizaru preparing to fire at Law's submarine
Koby's scream causes everyone, including Kizaru, to pause
Law's crew uses this pause to successfully submerge
The timing suggests Law would have been destroyed without this distraction
This explains why Shanks declared Koby's 'seconds of courage' changed the world
author: One Piece fan community

title: Shanks Stopped Kaido Before Coming to Marineford
theory: Before arriving at Marineford, Shanks encountered and stopped Kaido from joining the war. This theory suggests Shanks had to first prevent another Yonko from reaching Marineford before he could intervene himself. This would explain the timing of his arrival and why he came near the end of the war rather than at the beginning.
evidence: Kaido was stated to have been stopped from reaching Marineford
Shanks arrived relatively late in the war
Shanks' crew showed no signs of battle damage, suggesting a negotiation rather than fight
The timeline suggests Shanks dealt with Kaido first
author: One Piece fan community
